newsitem.title: UK: MEPC to buy Clarks factory retail outlets.
newsitem.headline: MEPC to buy Clarks factory retail outlets.

text.p: Property group MEPC Plc said on Tuesday that it is to buy three British factory outlet retail centres including shoemaker C & J Clark's pioneer outlet at Street, Somerset, for 80 million stg.
MEPC said the deal includes RAM Euro-Centres (Doncaster) Ltd, a joint venture between Clark and RAM Euro-Centres, and Clark's second centre at Kendal in Cumbria.
It said it is paying 55 million stg in cash and 25 million stg in loan notes.
Last year MEPC bought its first factory outlets centre at Royal Quays in Newcastle.
Completion of the latest purchase is expected at the beginning of June, the company said.
